leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-分子动力学与力场生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 力场→模拟→分析→可视化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: MD引擎 + 势模型 + 分析

unit.unit_name: 神经网络势/机器学习势工具链

queries: [WEB] machine learning force field software github
[WEB] equivariant graph neural network potential github
[WEB] molecular dynamics machine learning potentials github

tools.name: ACEpotentials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia implementation of Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE) potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for fitting and evaluating machine learning interatomic potentials based on the Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE) framework. It provides tools for parameterizing potentials for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: MACE
tools.one_line_profile: Higher-order equivariant message passing neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: MACE (Multi-Atomic Cluster Expansion) is a machine learning interatomic potential that combines the efficiency of message passing with the accuracy of high-body order equivariant features. It is used for fast and accurate molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: MACE-Foundations
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained foundation models for MACE potentials
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting foundation models based on the MACE architecture, including models trained on the Materials Project (MP) and other large datasets, enabling zero-shot or few-shot application to materials modeling tasks.

tools.name: MACE-JAX
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementation of MACE potentials
tools.detailed_description: The JAX implementation of the MACE interatomic potential, leveraging JAX's compilation and automatic differentiation capabilities for efficient training and inference in molecular simulations.

tools.name: MACE-Layer
tools.one_line_profile: Core equivariant graph neural network layers for MACE
tools.detailed_description: Provides the underlying higher-order equivariant graph neural network layers for 3D point clouds used in constructing MACE potentials. It serves as a building block for developing equivariant models in materials science.

tools.name: MACE-OFF
tools.one_line_profile: MACE models for organic molecules (MACE-OFF23)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MACE models specifically trained for organic chemistry applications (MACE-OFF23), suitable for simulating organic molecules and drug-like compounds.

tools.name: MOFSimBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for ML potentials in Metal-Organic Frameworks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking toolkit designed to evaluate the performance of universal machine learning interatomic potentials specifically for molecular modeling of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs).

tools.name: ESP_DNN
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for predicting electrostatic potential surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A Graph-Convolutional Deep Neural Network designed to predict electrostatic potential (ESP) surfaces of molecules, facilitating rapid evaluation of molecular properties for drug discovery and chemistry.

tools.name: Equitrain
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for training ML interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework designed for training and fine-tuning various machine learning interatomic potentials. It streamlines the workflow for developing potentials from ab initio data.

tools.name: PES-Learn
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of ML models for Potential Energy Surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that automates the generation of machine learning models for molecular Potential Energy Surfaces (PES). It handles data generation, sampling, and model training to create accurate PES representations.

tools.name: CHGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Charge-informed universal neural network potential
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained universal neural network potential that incorporates charge information for atomistic modeling. CHGNet is capable of predicting energies, forces, stresses, and magnetic moments for a wide range of materials.

tools.name: NequIP-LES
tools.one_line_profile: Local Environment Selection extension for NequIP
tools.detailed_description: An extension package for the NequIP code that implements Local Environment Selection (LES). This technique improves the scalability and efficiency of equivariant neural network potentials for large-scale simulations.

tools.name: n2p2
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Network Potential Package for MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: n2p2 (Neural Network Potential Package) is a C++ software for training and using high-dimensional neural network potentials. It is widely used for atomistic simulations and integrates with LAMMPS.

tools.name: FitSNAP
tools.one_line_profile: Software for generating machine-learning interatomic potentials for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: FitSNAP is a software package designed to generate machine-learning interatomic potentials (ML-IAP) specifically for use with the LAMMPS molecular dynamics engine. It automates the training process of potentials like SNAP (Spectral Neighbor Analysis Potential) using quantum mechanical data.

tools.name: lammps-tersoff-vector
tools.one_line_profile: Vectorized Implementation of the Tersoff Potential for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides an optimized, vectorized implementation of the Tersoff interatomic potential for the LAMMPS molecular dynamics software, aiming to improve simulation performance for materials modeled with this potential.

tools.name: aenet-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: Interface module between aenet and LAMMPS for ANN potentials
tools.detailed_description: This package provides an interface to couple the Atomic Energy Network (aenet) software with LAMMPS, enabling the use of Artificial Neural Network (ANN) potentials trained in aenet within LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: DPmoire
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for constructing machine learning force fields in moiré systems
tools.detailed_description: DPmoire is a specialized tool designed to construct accurate machine learning force fields specifically for moiré systems, addressing the challenges of modeling large-scale twisted bilayer structures.

tools.name: CatBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark Framework of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: CatBench is a benchmarking framework designed to evaluate the performance of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs), specifically focusing on their accuracy in predicting adsorption energies in catalytic systems.

tools.name: cp2k_2_deepmdkit
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for converting CP2K output to DeepMD-kit input
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool designed to facilitate the workflow between CP2K (ab initio molecular dynamics) and DeepMD-kit (machine learning potentials) by converting CP2K output data into the input format required for training DeepMD models.

tools.name: MatPL
tools.one_line_profile: Material Potential Library for generating machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: MatPL (formerly PWMLFF) is an open-source software package designed to rapidly generate machine learning force fields with accuracy comparable to Ab Initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD). It supports the training and usage of ML potentials for material simulations.

tools.name: SIMPLE-NN
tools.one_line_profile: SNU Interatomic Machine-learning PotentiaL packagE
tools.detailed_description: SIMPLE-NN is a package for generating and using neural network-based interatomic potentials. It provides tools for training potentials from ab initio data and using them for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: SPINNER
tools.one_line_profile: Structure Prediction of Inorganic crystals using Neural Network potentials
tools.detailed_description: SPINNER is a tool for predicting the structures of inorganic crystals. It combines Neural Network potentials with evolutionary and random search algorithms to efficiently explore the potential energy surface and identify stable crystal structures.

tools.name: SevenNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network interatomic potential package
tools.detailed_description: SevenNet is a graph neural network (GNN) based interatomic potential package. It is designed for efficient multi-GPU parallel molecular dynamics simulations, offering high performance and accuracy for material modeling.

tools.name: k_SRME
tools.one_line_profile: Heat-conductivity benchmark test for foundational machine-learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: k_SRME is a benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance of foundational machine-learning potentials specifically in the context of heat conductivity calculations, providing standardized tests for thermal properties.

tools.name: PyXtal_FF
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning Interatomic Potential Predictions
tools.detailed_description: PyXtal_FF is a Python package for developing and using machine learning interatomic potentials. It supports various descriptors and regression methods to model atomic interactions for materials simulations.

tools.name: gamd-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Accelerated Molecular Dynamics (GaMD) for OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: This repository implements Gaussian Accelerated Molecular Dynamics (GaMD) as a plugin/extension for the OpenMM simulation toolkit. It enables unconstrained enhanced sampling and free energy calculations for biomolecules.

tools.name: dem_hyperelasticity
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Energy Method for solving hyperelasticity PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implements the 'Deep Energy Method' (DEM), a neural network-based approach to solve partial differential equations in nonlinear elasticity at finite strain by minimizing potential energy.

tools.name: nnpdf
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning framework for global analyses of parton distributions
tools.detailed_description: NNPDF is an open-source machine learning framework used in High Energy Physics to determine the parton distribution functions (PDFs) of the proton using experimental data and neural networks.

tools.name: cuEquivariance
tools.one_line_profile: Math library for accelerating equivariant neural networks in science
tools.detailed_description: cuEquivariance is a specialized library providing low-level primitives and tensor operations to accelerate equivariant neural networks used in scientific models like DiffDock, MACE, Allegro, and NEQUIP.

tools.name: nnpf
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning applied to Phase Field methods
tools.detailed_description: nnpf is a tool/framework that applies machine learning techniques to accelerate or enhance Phase Field methods, which are widely used for simulating microstructure evolution in materials.

tools.name: NNP-MM
tools.one_line_profile: Interface scripts coupling TorchANI neural network potentials with NAMD
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and tools designed to interface the TorchANI neural network potential library with the NAMD molecular dynamics engine, enabling QM/MM-style simulations or pure ML-potential driven MD within NAMD.

tools.name: MLFF-Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning Force Field Framework by SAIT
tools.detailed_description: A software package provided by Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology (SAIT) for developing, training, and deploying machine learning force fields for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: DScribe
tools.one_line_profile: Library for creating machine learning descriptors for atomistic systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for transforming atomic structures into fixed-size numerical fingerprints (descriptors) such as Coulomb matrix, Sine matrix, Ewald sum matrix, ACSF, and SOAP, suitable for machine learning models in materials science.

tools.name: PDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Potential-free Data-driven Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A data-driven molecular dynamics simulation tool developed by TACC that bypasses explicit potential functions, using data-driven methods to propagate molecular systems.

tools.name: NNsForMD
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network class for molecular dynamics predictions
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by the AiMat lab (KIT) providing neural network classes specifically designed for molecular dynamics, capable of predicting potential energy, forces, and non-adiabatic couplings.

tools.name: AIMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Atoms In Molecules Neural Network Potential
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the AIMNet (Atoms In Molecules Neural Network) architecture, a modular and transferable neural network potential for modeling molecular systems and chemical reactions.

tools.name: aiqm-nnp
tools.one_line_profile: Common tools for PyTorch based neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: A utility library providing common components and tools for developing and running PyTorch-based neural network potentials, maintained by the AIQM organization (developers of TorchANI).

tools.name: TorchANI
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of ANI neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: TorchANI is a PyTorch-based library for training and using ANI (Accurate Neural network engine for molecular Energies) deep learning models for interatomic potentials, enabling highly accurate molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: apax
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible and performant framework for training machine learning potentials in JAX
tools.detailed_description: Apax is a package for training machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) using JAX. It focuses on scalability and performance, enabling efficient training of potentials for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: arcann_training
tools.one_line_profile: Automated enhanced sampling for generating training sets for reactive ML potentials
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool designed to automate the generation of training datasets for chemically reactive machine learning interatomic potentials through enhanced sampling techniques.

tools.name: active-learning-md
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for generating machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A workflow implementation for generating machine learning inter-atomic potentials driven by active learning, demonstrated on amorphous and liquid systems.

tools.name: mlip-arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark platform for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A fair and transparent benchmarking framework for machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs), evaluating them beyond basic error metrics to include stability and physical properties.

tools.name: SchNetPack
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Neural Networks for Atomistic Systems
tools.detailed_description: SchNetPack is a toolbox for the development and application of deep neural networks to the prediction of potential energy surfaces and other quantum-chemical properties of molecules and materials.

tools.name: G-SchNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generative neural networks for 3D molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: An extension for SchNetPack that implements G-SchNet, a generative model for sampling 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: ANI-1xnr
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning potential for reactive chemistry
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ANI-1xnr machine learning interatomic potential designed for condensed-phase reactive chemistry simulations.

tools.name: aenet
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic Energy NETwork - ANN potentials for atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: The Atomic Energy NETwork (ænet) package is a collection of tools for the construction and application of atomic interaction potentials based on artificial neural networks (ANNs).

tools.name: aenet-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of the aenet package
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-supported PyTorch implementation for training machine learning atomic potentials, compatible with the original aenet framework.

tools.name: aenet-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS interface for aenet potentials
tools.detailed_description: Provides an interface to use aenet neural network potentials within the LAMMPS molecular dynamics software.

tools.name: FastTrack
tools.one_line_profile: Mass transport estimation using ML force fields
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast estimation of mass transport properties (like diffusion) in materials based on machine learning force fields.

tools.name: uMLIP-Interactive
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for universal machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for running and visualizing simulations with various universal machine learning interatomic potentials like MACE, CHGNet, and SevenNet.

tools.name: BAMBOO
tools.one_line_profile: AI-driven machine learning force field for electrolytes
tools.detailed_description: BAMBOO (Bytedance AI Molecular BOOster) is a machine learning force field specifically designed for precise and efficient simulations of electrolyte systems.

tools.name: Cairn.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced sampling algorithms for active learning of ML-IPs
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing enhanced sampling algorithms specifically designed for the active learning of machine learning interatomic potentials (ML-IPs).

tools.name: PotentialLearning.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Atomistic data optimization and interatomic potential modeling tool
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for optimizing atomistic data and fitting interatomic potential models within molecular dynamics workflows.

tools.name: IANN
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant interatomic neural network potential framework
tools.detailed_description: IANN (InterAtomic Neural Network Framework) is a package for creating and training equivariant interatomic neural network potentials.

tools.name: ParamGULP
tools.one_line_profile: Interatomic potential fitting tool for GULP
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fitting interatomic potentials for molecular dynamics simulations, designed to work with GULP.

tools.name: muse
tools.one_line_profile: Builder for amorphous solids and liquid mixtures using MLIPs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for fast building of amorphous solids and liquid mixtures structures using Materials Project data and machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: modelforge
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure to implement and train Neural Network Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A library providing infrastructure to implement, train, and deploy neural network potentials (NNPs) for molecular simulation.

tools.name: ART-SM
tools.one_line_profile: Backmapping framework from Coarse-Grained to Atomistic resolution
tools.detailed_description: A fragment-based machine learning framework for backmapping coarse-grained (CG) structures to atomistic resolution.

tools.name: mlip-cleavage-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for MLIPs on surface stability and cleavage energy
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs) specifically on surface stability and cleavage energy predictions.

tools.name: deepmd-gnn
tools.one_line_profile: GNN plugin for DeePMD-kit
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for DeePMD-kit that enables the use of various graph neural network (GNN) models within the DeePMD framework.

tools.name: DeePMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy and MD
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning package for generating many-body potential energy representations and performing molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: DP-GEN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep potential generator workflow tool
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool designed to generate deep-learning based models of interatomic potential energy and force fields using active learning strategies.

tools.name: ReactBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for ML-enhanced transition state search
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool and source code for harnessing machine learning to enhance transition state search with interatomic potentials and generative models.

tools.name: PhaseForge
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for alloy phase diagram prediction using MLIPs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-throughput alloy phase diagram prediction integrating machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) with ATAT and CALPHAD modeling.

tools.name: OMNI-P2x
tools.one_line_profile: Universal neural network potential for excited states
tools.detailed_description: A universal neural network potential designed specifically for modeling excited states in atomistic systems.

tools.name: curator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for building robust machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to assist in the curation of data and building of robust machine learning potentials for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: phi-module
tools.one_line_profile: Electrostatics from Laplacian Eigenbasis for NNIPs
tools.detailed_description: A module implementing electrostatics from Laplacian Eigenbasis for Neural Network Interatomic Potentials (NNIPs).

tools.name: qcnn-hep
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum CNN for HEP event classification
tools.detailed_description: A package demonstrating and implementing Quantum Convolutional Neural Networks (QCNN) for classifying High Energy Physics (HEP) events from particle image data.

tools.name: neural-optimiser
tools.one_line_profile: Batched optimisation algorithms for NNP driven MD
tools.detailed_description: A library providing batched optimization algorithms specifically tailored for molecular dynamics simulations driven by neural network potentials.

tools.name: vaspMD
tools.one_line_profile: Tools and scripts for AIMD and MLFF-MD with VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to facilitate ab initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD) and Machine Learning Force Field MD (MLFF-MD) workflows using VASP.

tools.name: PnP-MACE
tools.one_line_profile: PnP algorithm and MACE framework for image reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Utilities and methods to use the Plug-and-Play (PnP) algorithm and Multi-Agent Consensus Equilibrium (MACE) framework for image reconstruction problems like CT.

tools.name: ABFML
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid building and fitting of machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the rapid building, fitting, and application of machine learning force fields.

tools.name: painn-jax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementation of PaiNN model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the PaiNN (Polarizable Atom Interaction Neural Network) model using the JAX framework.

tools.name: grappa
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learned Molecular Mechanics force field
tools.detailed_description: A machine learned Molecular Mechanics force field integrated into GROMACS and OpenMM for molecular simulations.

tools.name: OpenMACE
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source C++ implementation of the MACE machine learning force field architecture
tools.detailed_description: OpenMACE is an open-source C++ implementation of the MACE (Multi-Atomic Cluster Expansion) architecture, designed for efficient and accurate molecular dynamics simulations using equivariant message passing neural networks.

tools.name: pantea
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based Python library for developing machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: Pantea is a library built on JAX for creating and training machine learning interatomic potentials, leveraging JAX's automatic differentiation and compilation features for efficient potential development.

tools.name: DAS
tools.one_line_profile: Dual Adaptive Sampling method for training machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: DAS (Dual Adaptive Sampling) provides a strategy for active learning in the construction of machine learning interatomic potentials, helping to select the most informative configurations for training.

tools.name: DAC-SIM
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular simulation package integrating MLFFs for Direct Air Capture in MOFs
tools.detailed_description: DAC-SIM is a molecular simulation package designed to integrate machine learning force fields (MLFFs) specifically for studying Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs) in the context of Direct Air Capture (DAC) applications.

tools.name: mlip
tools.one_line_profile: Library for efficient training and application of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by InstaDeep for the efficient training, deployment, and application of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP) in atomistic simulations.

tools.name: mlipaudit
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and validation toolkit for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: mlipaudit provides tools for benchmarking, validating, and auditing the performance and accuracy of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs).

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ASE interface for the ANI-1 neural network potential
tools.detailed_description: ASE_ANI provides a Python interface integrating the ANI-1 neural network potential with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), enabling molecular dynamics and optimization using ANI potentials.

tools.name: amaceing_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for input generation and post-processing of ML potential simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the creation of input files for various simulation codes (CP2K, MACE-torch, MatterSim, etc.) and to handle the post-processing and evaluation of simulation results.

tools.name: augment-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset augmentation library for atomistic machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library specifically designed for performing data augmentation on atomistic datasets, enhancing the training of machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: mff
tools.one_line_profile: Package for building nonparametric machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for constructing nonparametric force fields using machine learning techniques, developed by the KCL-TSCM group.

tools.name: MDsim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for training and running MD with ML force fields
tools.detailed_description: A package for training machine learning force fields and performing molecular dynamics simulations, associated with a TMLR 2023 publication.

tools.name: catalyticLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Catalytic Large Atomic Model for catalysis simulations
tools.detailed_description: A machine-learning-based interatomic potential tool specifically designed for catalysis applications, aiming to provide a universal large atomic model.

tools.name: ALF
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning Framework for machine-learned interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: ALF is a framework developed at LANL for performing active learning to efficiently train machine-learned interatomic potentials by automatically selecting training configurations.

tools.name: hippynn
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for atomistic machine learning and neural networks
tools.detailed_description: Hippynn is a modular library for building and training atomistic machine learning models, particularly neural network potentials, developed at LANL.

tools.name: alchemical-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: Alchemical machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for developing and using alchemical machine learning interatomic potentials, enabling exploration of chemical space through alchemical changes.

tools.name: TSFF
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning force field method for transition state searching
tools.detailed_description: TSFF implements a machine learning force field method specifically tailored for transition state searching in catalytic reactions.

tools.name: phonon_uMLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon property calculation using universal MLIPs
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate phonon properties of materials by leveraging multiple universal machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: deeptime
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for analysis of time-series data and molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: Deeptime is a Python library for the analysis of time-series data, specifically focused on molecular dynamics, offering tools for dimensionality reduction, clustering, and Markov state modeling.

tools.name: HDNNP
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of High Dimensional Neural Network Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of High Dimensional Neural Network Potentials (HDNNP) for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: maml
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for materials machine learning and descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for materials machine learning, offering functionality for materials descriptors, machine learning force fields, and deep learning models tailored for materials science applications.

tools.name: mlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed to evaluate and compare machine learning interatomic potentials for materials, facilitating the assessment of model performance and accuracy.

tools.name: MACE-H
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for predicting electronic Hamiltonians in atomic orbital representation
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) based model for predicting electronic Hamiltonians in atomic orbital representation, incorporating many-body messages for accurate electronic structure prediction.

tools.name: featomic
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computing representations for atomistic machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A library dedicated to computing atomic representations (descriptors) for atomistic machine learning, serving as a core component in ML potential workflows.

tools.name: metatensor
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse tensor data format for atomistic machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A self-describing sparse tensor data format and library designed to handle data for atomistic machine learning and other scientific computing tasks, ensuring interoperability and efficiency.

tools.name: metatomic
tools.one_line_profile: Portable atomistic machine learning models library
tools.detailed_description: A library enabling the use of atomistic machine learning models across different environments and applications, focusing on portability and deployment of trained potentials.

tools.name: metatrain
tools.one_line_profile: Training and fine-tuning toolkit for atomistic ML models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit to train, fine-tune, and manipulate machine learning models for atomistic systems, streamlining the model development workflow in materials science.

tools.name: MatterSim
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning atomistic model across elements, temperatures and pressures
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based atomistic model capable of simulating materials across a wide range of elements, temperatures, and pressures, designed for broad applicability in materials simulation.

tools.name: Timewarp
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning accelerator for molecular dynamics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A research project and tool using deep learning techniques to accelerate molecular dynamics simulations, enabling the exploration of longer timescales.

tools.name: Allegro
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable equivariant deep learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An open-source code for building highly scalable and accurate E(3)-equivariant deep learning interatomic potentials, designed for efficient molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: NequIP
tools.one_line_profile: E(3)-equivariant graph neural networks for interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A code for building E(3)-equivariant interatomic potentials using graph neural networks, providing high data efficiency and accuracy for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: pair_nequip_allegro
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS pair styles for NequIP and Allegro potentials
tools.detailed_description: Provides LAMMPS pair styles to enable the use of NequIP and Allegro deep learning interatomic potentials within the LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulation package.

tools.name: lineshape_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for evaluating electron-phonon coupling effects on optical properties
tools.detailed_description: Python software implementing the formulation for evaluating the effects of electron-phonon coupling on the optical properties of defects, designed to interface with the MACE machine learning interatomic potential.

tools.name: pesnet
tools.one_line_profile: Ab-Initio Potential Energy Surfaces by Pairing GNNs with Neural Wave Functions
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of PESNet for generating ab-initio potential energy surfaces by combining Graph Neural Networks with Neural Wave Functions, enabling sampling-free inference.

tools.name: alebrew
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-biased molecular dynamics for learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing uncertainty-biased molecular dynamics to facilitate the learning of uniformly accurate interatomic potentials, improving the robustness of ML potentials.

tools.name: PaiNN-model
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of PaiNN model for ML interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An efficient implementation of the PaiNN (Polarizable Atom Interaction Neural Network) model for constructing machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: MLFF_QD
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning Force Fields for Quantum Dots
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating and using machine learning force fields specifically tailored for quantum dot systems.

tools.name: NNPOps
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance operations for neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: A library providing high-performance implementations of operations commonly used in neural network potentials, optimized for efficiency in atomistic simulations.

tools.name: GAML
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic Algorithm Machine Learning package for automated force field parameterization
tools.detailed_description: GAML (Genetic Algorithm Machine Learning) is a software package designed to automate the parameterization of force fields using genetic algorithms. It facilitates the optimization of force field parameters to match reference data, streamlining the development of computational chemistry models.

tools.name: charge_transfer_nnp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network potential incorporating charge transfer effects
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based interatomic potential that explicitly models charge transfer phenomena. This tool is designed to improve the accuracy of atomistic simulations where charge redistribution plays a critical role.

tools.name: BOMLIP-CSP
tools.one_line_profile: Framework integrating MLIPs with batched optimization for crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework that combines machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) with a tailored batched optimization strategy. It enables rapid and unbiased crystal structure prediction (CSP) across a full density range.

tools.name: lpNNPS4SPH
tools.one_line_profile: Low-precision nearest neighbor particle searching for SPH simulations
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA-based implementation of a nearest neighboring particle searching algorithm optimized for Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) simulations, utilizing low-precision arithmetic for performance acceleration.

tools.name: ichor
tools.one_line_profile: Data management library for machine learning force field development
tools.detailed_description: A computational chemistry data management library designed to assist in the development of machine learning force fields. It handles data processing, storage, and retrieval tasks associated with training datasets for atomic potentials.

tools.name: pyiron_potentialfit
tools.one_line_profile: Module for fitting machine learning interatomic potentials within pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A component of the pyiron integrated development environment (IDE) dedicated to fitting machine learning interatomic potentials. It provides workflows and tools to train and validate potentials using the pyiron framework.

tools.name: VERTEX
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual Electrode Recording Tool for EXtracellular potentials
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB simulator for spatially realistic Local Field Potential (LFP) simulation in spiking neural networks. It allows researchers to model extracellular potentials generated by large populations of neurons.

tools.name: EquivariantMultipoleGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant GNN for atomic multipole prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an equivariant Graph Neural Network designed to predict atomic multipoles up to quadrupoles. This tool is useful for modeling electrostatic interactions in molecular systems.

tools.name: GNNParametrizedFF
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network Parametrized Potentials
tools.detailed_description: Models and tools for 'Regularized by Physics: Graph Neural Network Parametrized Potentials for the Description of Intermolecular Interactions'. It provides a method to parametrize force fields using GNNs.

tools.name: torchani-amber
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for using ANI-style NN potentials in Amber MD
tools.detailed_description: An interface that enables the use of ANI-style and other neural network interatomic potentials (NN-IPs) within the Amber molecular dynamics software suite. It supports both sander and pmemd engines.

tools.name: atomate2_ffforge
tools.one_line_profile: Active-learning workflow for building MLIPs using atomate2
tools.detailed_description: A DIRECT-driven, active-learning workflow integrated with the atomate2/jobflow ecosystem. It autonomously builds machine-learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) for various materials such as batteries and catalysts.

tools.name: cuda-mace
tools.one_line_profile: CUDA implementations of MACE models
tools.detailed_description: Provides CUDA-accelerated implementations of MACE (Machine Learning Atomic Cluster Expansion) models, enabling faster inference and simulation for atomistic systems on GPU hardware.

tools.name: ParetoCSP
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure prediction using NN potential and Pareto genetic algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A tool for crystal structure prediction that utilizes a neural network potential combined with an age-fitness Pareto genetic algorithm to explore and optimize crystal structures.

tools.name: GAIA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of reactive MLIP datasets
tools.detailed_description: GAIA automates the process of generating datasets for reactive machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs), facilitating the training of robust potentials for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: openmm_constV
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin for constant potential molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the OpenMM simulation toolkit that enables running molecular dynamics simulations under constant electrical potential conditions using the Image Charge method.

tools.name: eqnn-jax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementations of equivariant graph neural networks (EGNN, SEGNN, NequIP)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of annotated implementations of equivariant graph neural networks, including EGNN, SEGNN, and NequIP, written in JAX. These models are fundamental for developing machine learning potentials and analyzing geometric data.

tools.name: sGDML
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation of the Symmetric Gradient Domain Machine Learning model
tools.detailed_description: The reference implementation for the Symmetric Gradient Domain Machine Learning (sGDML) model, a machine learning method for constructing accurate and data-efficient force fields for molecules and materials.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that supports machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs). It facilitates the integration of MLIP training and inference into automated high-throughput computational workflows.

tools.name: mlff
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based framework for building and training machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for building neural networks for machine learning force fields using JAX, facilitating the creation of interatomic potentials.

tools.name: mddatasetbuilder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for constructing reference datasets for neural network potential training
tools.detailed_description: A script designed to build reference datasets for training neural network potentials by processing given LAMMPS trajectories.

tools.name: TorchMD-NET
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Transformer for molecular dynamics and neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: A library for training neural network potentials, featuring state-of-the-art equivariant transformer architectures for molecular simulations.

tools.name: chemtrain
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible training routines for neural network potentials in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library for training neural network potentials through customizable routines in JAX, supporting various loss functions and optimization strategies.

tools.name: difftre
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Trajectory Reweighting for learning potentials from experimental data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning neural network potentials by matching experimental data via Differentiable Trajectory Reweighting.

tools.name: AMPtorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of the Atomistic Machine Learning Package (AMP)
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based package for atomistic machine learning, enabling the training and usage of machine learning potentials.

tools.name: finetuna
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate active learning workflows for training and refining machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: chipsff
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for evaluating universal machine learning force-fields
tools.detailed_description: A tool from NIST for evaluating the performance and accuracy of universal machine learning force-fields.

tools.name: AIMNet2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and transferable neural network interatomic potential
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of AIMNet2, a general-purpose neural network interatomic potential designed for fast and accurate molecular simulations.
